newsitem.title: SUDAN: Eighteen drown in Nile when boat capsizes in Sudan.
newsitem.headline: Eighteen drown in Nile when boat capsizes in Sudan.

text.p: Eighteen people drowned when the boat they were travelling in capsized on the Nile river in northern Sudan, a Sudanese newspaper reported on Wednesday.

Alwan newspaper did not say what caused the accident, which took place on Monday when the boat carrying 23 people was crossing the river on its way to a park west of Atbara, about 440 km (260 miles) north of Khartoum. Five people survived.
